programme.title: The Godfather Part II, (1974, Drama)
programme.desc: The continuing saga of a young Vito Corleone growing up in Sicily and in New York during the 1910s and then following Michael Corleone in the 1950s as he tries to expand the family business.

programme.title: Mario Puzo's The Godfather Coda: The Death of Michael Corleone, (2020, Drama)
programme.desc: Director/screenwriter Francis Ford Coppola's definitive new edit and restoration of THE GODFATHER: PART III, with remastered picture and sound. Michael Corleone (Pacino) seeks to free his family from crime and find a suitable successor to his empire.

programme.title: Best Men, (1999, Comedy)
programme.desc: Drew Barrymore, Luke Wilson and Sean Patrick Flannery star in this hilarious action-comedy wherein Drew Barrymore is a young woman determined to have the perfect wedding day, despite the fact that the groomsmen have decided to rob the local bank.

programme.title: Layer Cake, (2004, Thriller)
programme.desc: Planning to retire and begin a new life, Mr. X (Daniel Craig, Lara Croft: Tomb Raider), a successful West End drug dealer, has been asked for one last favor: to negotiate the sale of one million hits of Ecstasy. Rated: R

programme.title: Jagged Edge, (1985, Thriller)
programme.desc: A grisly homicide, a sensational trial, a forbidden affair it's JAGGED EDGE, a razor-sharp suspense thriller about crime, punishment and passion. Jeff Bridges is the prime suspect and Glenn Close plays the attorney who falls in love with him. rated -R

programme.title: Donnie Brasco, (1997, Drama)
programme.desc: Posing as jewel broker Donnie Brasco, FBI agent Joseph D. Pistone (Johnny Depp) is granted entrance into the violent mob family of aging hit man Lefty Ruggiero (Al Pacino).

programme.title: 88 Minutes, (2007, Drama)
programme.desc: A college professor, who moonlights as a forensic psychiatrist for the FBI, receives a death threat that says he has only 88 minutes to live. To save his life, he must use all his skills and training to narrow down the possible suspects.

programme.title: Heist, (2001, Action)
programme.desc: A jewel thief's nephew is sent along on a heist to ensure a longtime partner in crime stays honest about the division of the loot.

programme.title: 52 Pick-Up, (1986, Action)
programme.desc: Life is good for Los Angeles entrepreneur Harry Mitchell (Roy Scheider), great business, beautiful home and a gorgeous wife (Ann-Margret).

programme.title: Mr. Majestyk, (1974, Action)
programme.desc: Charles Bronson stars as an ex-con and Vietnam vet whose efforts to run a straight business soon have him locking horns with both the law and the mafia in this explosive tale of backwoods revenge.

programme.title: Death Wish, (1974, Action)
programme.desc: In this explosive story of revenge and urban violence, Charles Bronson plays Paul Kersey, a bleeding-heart liberal who has a change of opinion after his wife and daughter are violently attacked by a gang of thugs in their apartment.

programme.title: Assault on Precinct 13, (1976, Action)
programme.desc: The isolated inhabitants of an abandoned police station are under attack by the overwhelming numbers of a seemingly unstoppable street gang.

programme.title: The Taking of Pelham One Two Three, (1974, Thriller)
programme.desc: A gang hijacks a subway train and threaten to kill the hostages one by one until their demands are met. Forced to stall, transit chief Lt. Garber (Walter Matthau) must outmaneuver one of the craftiest and cruelest screen villains (Robert Shaw) ever.

programme.title: Rolling Thunder, (1977, Action)
programme.desc: William Devane and Tommy Lee Jones star as two former P.O.W.s out for revenge in this neo-noir action-thriller that Quentin Tarantino cites as one of his favorite films. Written by genre masters Paul Schrader and Heywood Gould. John Flynn directs.

programme.title: The Conversation, (1974, Thriller)
programme.desc: Coppola's provoking mystery-drama in which Harry Caul, expert surveillance man, hears something disturbing in his recording of a young couple in a park. He worries about what the tape may be used for and becomes involved in a maze of secrecy and murder.

programme.title: Skin, (2019, Drama)
programme.desc: Inspired by true events, a young man makes the dangerous choice to leave the white supremacist gang he joined as a teenager. With his former friends against him, he is determined to create a new life for himself—if he can make it out alive.

programme.title: Green Room, (2016, Thriller)
programme.desc: After witnessing a shocking crime, a young rock band is unexpectedly thrust into a life-or-death battle to escape the clutches of a diabolical club owner (Patrick Stewart) and his ruthless henchmen in this white-knuckle thriller.

programme.title: Varsity Blues, (1999, Inspirational Drama)
programme.desc: At first, backup quarterback Jonathan is no football star. But when the starting quarterback is injured, he is thrown into the game but also in direct conflict with his coach and girlfriend.

programme.title: Good Will Hunting, (1997, Inspirational Drama)
programme.desc: The hit Oscar-winning drama which launched the careers of Matt Damon and Ben Affleck tells the tale of a headstrong, working-class genius who's failing the lessons of life, until he meets a relatable psychology professor (Robin Williams).

programme.title: Clueless, (1995, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: A US West Coast teen lifestyle parody centered around Cher, a popular high school girl who spends her days playing match-maker, helping her friends with fashion choices, and looking for a boyfriend.

programme.title: Varsity Blues, (1999, Inspirational Drama)
programme.desc: At first, backup quarterback Jonathan is no football star. But when the starting quarterback is injured, he is thrown into the game but also in direct conflict with his coach and girlfriend.

programme.title: Good Will Hunting, (1997, Inspirational Drama)
programme.desc: The hit Oscar-winning drama which launched the careers of Matt Damon and Ben Affleck tells the tale of a headstrong, working-class genius who's failing the lessons of life, until he meets a relatable psychology professor (Robin Williams).

programme.title: Girl, Interrupted, (1999, Drama)
programme.desc: Winona Ryder and Academy Award(r)-winner Angelina Jolie are the certifiable stars of Claymoore Hospital's South Bell ward in this wry adaptation of Susanna Kaysen's best-selling memoir.

programme.title: Pulp Fiction, (1994, Thriller)
programme.desc: Writer-director Quentin Tarantino delivers an iconic cast of characters in PULP FICTION, a wildly entertaining tale of violence and redemption. John Travolta, Samuel L. Jackson, Uma Thurman, and Bruce Willis star in this pop culture phenomenon.

programme.title: The Crow, (1994, Action)
programme.desc: Visually stunning and action-packed, this hit movie, based on the comic book series, follows the return from the grave of a young rock guitarist who, along with his fiancée, is brutally killed by a ruthless gang of criminals.

programme.title: 3 Days of the Condor, (1975, Thriller)
programme.desc: A mild-mannered CIA researcher, paid to read books, returns from lunch to find all of his co-workers assassinated. "Condor" must find out who did this and get in from the cold before the hitmen get him.

programme.title: Midnight Cowboy, (1969, Drama)
programme.desc: This Academy Award-winning Best Picture stars Dustin Hoffman and Jon Voight in standout, Oscar-nominated performances as a con man and a Texas hustler trying to survive on the tough streets of New York. The legendary John Schlesinger directs.

programme.title: The Last Tycoon, (1976, Drama)
programme.desc: F. Scott Fitzgerald's fascinating tale of studio politics in early Hollywood is breathtakingly brought to the screen by director Elia Kazan and screenwriter Harold Pinter.

programme.title: Ned Kelly, (1970, Western)
programme.desc: Mick Jagger makes his dynamic screen debut in this explosive tale based on the true-life story of the 19th-century Australian 'Armored Bandit,' who would become a mythic sagebrush hero even as the law closes in and prepares for an all-out war.

programme.title: The Mechanic, (1972, Action)
programme.desc: In a role that powered him to stardom, Charles Bronson is an underworld executioner who turns murder into an art form in this ultimate crime chiller.

programme.title: Mr. Majestyk, (1974, Action)
programme.desc: Charles Bronson stars as an ex-con and Vietnam vet whose efforts to run a straight business soon have him locking horns with both the law and the mafia in this explosive tale of backwoods revenge.

programme.title: Love And Bullets, (1979, Action)
programme.desc: The FBI sends a loner (Charles Bronson) to kidnap a mobster's mistress in Switzerland.

programme.title: Serpico, (1973, Thriller)
programme.desc: A true-life drama of a cop whose revelations about the extent of bribery in the New York Police Department almost led to his death and resulted in the creation of the Knapp Commission.

programme.title: 3 Days of the Condor, (1975, Thriller)
programme.desc: A mild-mannered CIA researcher, paid to read books, returns from lunch to find all of his co-workers assassinated. "Condor" must find out who did this and get in from the cold before the hitmen get him.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: If Yugi is eliminated from the tournament, KaibaCorp's crooked Board of Directors will transfer control of the company from Kaiba to Pegasus! Kaiba's brother Mokuba challenges Yugi to a duel to protect his brother's company!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi must duel a magical doppelganger of Kaiba, created from the greed and power lust Yugi wiped from Kaiba's soul.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi defeats the Blue Eyes White Dragon, but there are two more waiting in the wings! Will the real Kaiba reach Yugi in time to help beat this impersonator?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey decides to battle Rex Raptor without his friends' help to prove that he is man enough to take care of Serenity on his own.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey duels valiantly, but Rex Raptor has unleashed his secret weapon: the Red-Eyes Black Dragon!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi's classmate Bakura, possessed by his Millennium Ring's dark powers, traps Yugi and friends in a Shadow Game where they become the cards themselves!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Pegasus's hired duelist Panik cheats Mai of all her star chips, and Yugi vows to defeat him and win them back. But when Panik's Castle of Dark Illusions enshrouds his monsters in a black mist, how can Yugi defeat an enemy he cannot see?
programme.sub-title: The Light at the End of the Tunnel

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Despite his astonishing disadvantage, Yugi boldly provokes Panik - "I'll finish you in three turns." Is Yugi bluffing, or does he have the advantage in this battle of wits?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba descends to the kingdom to face Pegasus. Has Kaiba changed since his battle with Yugi, or is he still the same merciless duelist? A battle between Kaiba's Blue Eyes White Dragon and Joey's Red Eyes Black Dragon holds the answers!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Bandit Keith's gang kidnaps Joey to a secret cave with a graveyard playing field. As Yugi and friends search for him, Joey faces Bandit Keith's zombie monsters which become stronger as they return from the grave!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey's last-ditch effort, his lucky Time Wizard card, fails against Bandit Keith's zombie monsters. But as his lucky streak comes to an end, will his improving skills as a duelist and his love for his sister inspire him to victory?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and Joey band together in a team battle against the Paradox Brothers with all the Star Chips and entrance to Pegasus's castle on the line!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The Paradox Brothers summon the almighty Gate Guardian, a monster that reflects all attacks! Is Joey helping Yugi in this duel, or is his lack of experience sealing their fate for defeat?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and Joey each unleash their strongest monster, the Summoned Skull, and the Red-Eyes Black Dragon, but their strength pales in comparison to the tremendous power of the Gate Guardian.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: In order to earn the right to challenge Pegasus, Kaiba must first beat Yugi and take his Star Chips. The rematch between Yugi and Kaiba is about to begin!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba summons the Blue-Eyes Ultimate Dragon, the strongest monster in the game fused from three Blue-Eyes White Dragons! Yugi has lost all his powerful Duel Monsters, but a true duelist never gives up!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi begins spinning a strategy to put the Blue-Eyes Ultimate Dragon to rest, but he must decide whether to claim victory or spare Kaiba his life. Yugi's heart is split in two!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Having lost his star chips to Kaiba and his only opportunity to save Grandpa, Yugi is in a state of shock. Can Tea bring Yugi back to consciousness by defeating Mai for her extra star chips and teach Yugi the heart of the duelist?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and friends enter the castle to discover Kaiba ready to duel Pegasus with Mokuba's soul hanging in the balance! The power of the Millennium Eye gives Pegasus the ability to read other people's minds.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba is helpless against Pegasus's Toon World deck and mind-reading abilities. As the duel ends, Pegasus imprisons Kaiba's soul into a card, just like Grandpa and Mokuba!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi vows to overthrow Pegasus for the sake of his Grandpa. Tristan leads an exploration party to uncover Pegasus's secrets. While Joey sleeps, Bandit Keith steals from him the card that permits his entry in the final battle!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Under Pegasus's glare, Yugi is distracted from his duel with Mai. After making foolish errors and allowing Mai to gain a huge advantage with her Harpie's Pet Dragon, will Yugi gather his focus or succumb to the pressure?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Mai has rebounded from her previous loss to Joey to become a better duelist. Has Yugi learned from his loss to Kaiba, or is the emotional defeat still weighing on his heart? The answer is in the cards!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey searches for the card that permits him to enter the final battle, not realizing Bandit Keith has stolen it. As he struggles to accept the fact that Serenity will be blind forever, he receives help from a new friend!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: After Bandit Keith's Machine deck forces Joey to take the defensive, Joey mimics Keith's battle strategy to metalize his Red-Eyes Black Dragon! Is victory assured, or does the cheater Bandit Keith literally have one last card up his sleeve?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey challenges Yugi for the right to face Pegasus. In a battle between friends, a fierce match ensues between the two people who know each other's strategies and cards.
programme.sub-title: Best of Friends Best of Duelists, Part 1

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi is shocked as Joey uses the Time Wizard card on him. It's the very same card Yugi gave Joey as a sign of friendship!
programme.sub-title: Best of Friends Best of Duelists, Part 2

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi prepares for the ultimate battle against Pegasus with the souls of Grandpa, Kaiba, and Mokuba on the line.
programme.sub-title: Yugi vs. Pegasus Match of the Millennium, Part 1

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Pegasus punishes Yugi using the same Toon Deck and mind-reading abilities he used on Kaiba. As Pegasus turns Yugi's monsters against him, Yugi loses the will to battle. Will Pegasus capture Yugi's soul into a card, just like Kaiba?
programme.sub-title: Yugi vs. Pegasus Match of the Millennium, Part 2

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi has found a counter to Pegasus's mind-reading ability: Yugi switches back and forth between his two souls! Yugi is able to destroy Pegasus's Toon World, but the duel has just only begun. The next level of the deadly Shadow Game is about to start!
programme.sub-title: Yugi vs. Pegasus Match of the Millennium, Part 3

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi crumples under the power of the Shadow Game. His friends yell desperate encouragement, but their voices cannot penetrate the sphere of darkness. Yugi's chance at victory is slipping away, as is his life!
programme.sub-title: Yugi vs. Pegasus Match of the Millennium, Part 4

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Pegasus summons Relinquished, a fearsome monster that can consume Yugi's Duel Monsters! Yugi counters with… Kuriboh?
programme.sub-title: Yugi vs. Pegasus Match of the Millennium, Part 5

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi meets a mysterious Egyptian named Shadi who enters Yugi's mind with the Millennium Key. What are these Millennium Items, and do they hold the answer to the mystery behind the Shadow Games?

programme.title: Luffy's fist of fire puts Hordy down for the count, and the rest of the Straw Hats try to make short work of the remaining Fish-Man Pirates. Meanwhile, a very big boat looms overhead!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: LUFFY'S ALL-OUT ATTACK! RED HAWK BLASTS!

programme.title: While the rest of the Straw Hats try to make short work of their enemies, Luffy summons the strength for one last brutal attack on Hordy. Now, about that giant boat…
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: COMING TO AN END! THE FINAL DECISIVE BATTLE AGAINST HORDY!

programme.title: After defeating Hordy, Luffy turns his attention to stopping the Noah from crushing Fish-Man Island. Straw Hats and Fish-Men alike watch as Luffy tries to obliterate a boat with a barrage of brutal blows!
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Fish-Man Island was saved by the timely arrival of the Sea Kings, but all is not well. Luffy lost a lot of blood in his battle with Hordy, and fish-to-human transfusions are strictly forbidden!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: TO THE FUTURE! THE PATH TO THE SUN!

programme.title: Jimbei must decide whether or not to join the Straw Hats, and the grateful citizens of Fish-Man Island host a fabulous banquet in honor of their human heroes!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE SECRET REVEALED! THE TRUTH ABOUT THE ANCIENT WEAPON!

programme.title: Luffy and his crew learn of epic battle between Aokiji and Akainu, a forgotten foe tries to kidnap the mermaid princess, and Hordy's gang finally gets what's coming to them!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE STRAW HATS STUNNED! THE NEW FLEET ADMIRAL OF THE NAVY!

programme.title: When Luffy, Zoro, and Sanji stumble upon a couple of Big Mam's henchmen extorting sweets from the peaceful people of Fish-Man Island, the Straw Hats make a new – and very powerful – enemy!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: SHE LOVES SWEETS! BIG MOM OF THE FOUR EMPERORS!

programme.title: The Straw Hats prepare to depart Fish-Man Island, a lion and a caribou come to blows over booby-trapped treasure, and Vice Admiral Smoker makes his presence felt in the New World!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: MANY PROBLEMS LIE AHEAD! A TRAP AWAITING IN THE NEW WORLD!

programme.title: Luffy and his crew bid farewell to their new friends before setting off in search of the greatest adventures the New World has to offer!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: FINALLY TIME TO GO! GOODBYE, FISHMAN ISLAND!

programme.title: Luffy and Usopp's extreme deep sea fishing adventure lands the crew in the middle of a deadly whirlpool, but an unexpected encounter with a pod of giant whales may bail the Straw Hats out of hot water!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: TO THE NEW WORLD! HEADING FOR THE ULTIMATE SEA!

programme.title: Luffy's arrival in the New World is marked by violent weather and the discovery of a tiny stowaway. When the Straw Hats agree to help their new friend, it could lead to big trouble with the Marines!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Z’s Ambition! Lily the Little Giant!

programme.title: Nami hatches a plan to save Lily's father, but the arrival of an ex-marine madman throws a monkey wrench into the rescue mission.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Z’s Ambition! A Dark and Powerful Army!

programme.title: Luffy and Zoro find themselves locked in battle with their latest foes, but Nami's knowledge of the sea may be the key to escaping this scrum alive!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Z’s Ambition! A Great and Desperate Escape Plan!

programme.title: Shuzo's squad of manned torpedoes targets the Straw Hats and the giants! The crazed captain tests Luffy's mettle in a showdown on land, but the wily pirate pulls off a supersized surprise in hopes to stomp out the madman for good
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: A desperate cry for help leads the Straw Hats to Punk Hazard, an island engulfed in flames and inhabited by a mythic beast that could make short work of Luffy and the gang!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Arriving! A Burning Island – Punk Hazard!

programme.title: Luffy and Zoro put their strength to the ultimate test in a battle with a dragon. Meanwhile, a band of mysterious intruders make their gassy presence felt aboard the Sunny!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Battle in the Heat! Luffy vs. the Giant Dragon!

programme.title: Luffy gets up close and personal with a torso-less Samurai! Elsewhere, Nami, Sanji, Chopper, and Franky find themselves imprisoned with the pieces of a human face!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Straw Hats Stunned! Enter: A Samurai’s Horrifying Severed Head!

programme.title: Luffy makes friends with a Centaur, Franky uses a cola-powered laser to break out of the clink, and Sanji takes a chance on a body-less Samurai!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Startling! The Secret of the Island Is Finally Revealed!

programme.title: Nami's soft spot for children prompts her to call off the escape and declare war on anyone who makes a kid cry. Meanwhile, Luffy and the gang take a banana boat to the icy side of the island!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Save the Children! The Straw Hats Start to Fight!

programme.title: Luffy's group finds themselves up against a gang of centaurs, Brook battles the torso of a surly samurai, and Captain Smoker encounters someone highly unexpected!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Swordplay Showdown! Brook vs. the Mysterious Torso Samurai!

programme.title: Nami and Chopper seek a safe exit for the children, Luffy's group hopes to avoid a perilous plunge into icy waters, and Captain Smoker faces off against Trafalgar Law!
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Luffy's group takes a deadly plunge into icy waters, and Trafalgar Law uses his unique abilities to rearrange Nami's group and cast our heroes into chaotic confusion!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: In a Real Pinch! Luffy Sinks into the Ice-Cold Lake!

programme.title: While Luffy and his mates race toward a reunion, Admiral Smoker struggles to survive a heart-stopping showdown with Trafalgar Law!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Collision! Law vs. Vice Admiral Smoker!

programme.title: Luffy is excited to once again cross paths with Trafalgar Law, but a reunion with his mixed up crew – and the loss of his extra legs – quickly dampens the captain's enthusiasm!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Meeting Again After Two Years! Luffy and Law!

programme.title: While Captain Smoker determines his next move, a very large pirate with alligator legs tells Luffy and the Straw Hats the true story of Punk Hazard's mysterious transformation!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Worst in the World! A Scientist of Terror - Caesar!

programme.title: In the aftermath of Toriko, Luffy, and Goku's three-way tie in the World's Best Eating Competition, the festivities are interrupted by the sudden appearance of a monster that threatens to consume every living thing on earth.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: History’s Strongest Collaboration vs. Glutton of the Sea

programme.title: The giant children fly into a mysterious rage, and Chopper discovers the true reason for their unusual condition! Meanwhile, Zoro, Brook, and Sanji cross paths with a dangerous duo!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Chopper's Fury! The Master's Inhumane Experiment!

programme.title: The story of how Trafalgar Law arrived at Punk Hazard is revealed, and the Yeti Cool Brothers set their sights on a showdown with the Straw Hats!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: To Annihilate the Straw Hats! Legendary Assassins Descend!

programme.title: Luffy tries to chase down the Yetti Cool Brothers, but Franky – still trapped in Chopper's Body – makes his mission extremely difficult. Just when all appears lost, an unexpected ally lends a hand!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Save Nami! Luffy's Fight on the Snow-Capped Mountains!

programme.title: Luffy agrees to an alliance with Trafalgar Law, but the Straw Hats refuse to leave the island until the children are safe. Meanwhile, the gaseous master unleashes something very deadly!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Formed! Luffy and Law's Pirate Alliance!

programme.title: Zoro, Sanji, and Brook continue their search for the samurai, Trafalgar tries to sneak Chopper into the laboratory, and Luffy boldly challenges the Master!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Capture M! The Pirate Alliance's Operation Launches!

programme.title: Luffy's battle with his old nemesis Smoker is interrupted by the arrival of a terrifying toxic blob – and the evil genius who created the monster!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: On the Verge of Annihilation! A Deadly Monster Comes Flying In!

programme.title: The Straw Hats make a valiant push to capture Caesar Clown - Luffy matches his Armament Haki with Clown's powerful Gas-Gas Fruit powers! The battle turns in favor of the Straw Hats, but underestimating Clown's abilities may have deadly consequences!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: An Intense Battle! Caesar Exercises His True Power!

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd TVSP #12 Missed by a Dollar
programme.desc: At an auction in New York, attendees are shocked when a mysterious man bids $1,000,000 on a plain diamond ring. The man himself is even more astounded when the President of the World Bank outbids him by a single dollar. The man is Lupin!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Inspector Zenigata arrives in San Marino after receiving a note from Lupin III. Instead of a declaration of a new theft, it's a wedding invitation.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Marlow Brozzi, a soccer player from San Marino. A mafia member has proof that Brozzi is cheating so Brozzi approaches Lupin for help.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Lupin and the gang managed to steal a fragment of Marie Antoinette's necklace, but Jigen has been captured by Nyx.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: A toothache prompts Jigen to rush to a clinic in a ruined town. The doctor, Livia, says she'll only take a look at him if he'll let her hold on to his gun, so he has no choice but to hand it over.
programme.sub-title: With a Gun in My Hand

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Fujiko Mine is seen with the members of a failing circus troupe. A former member of the troupe, Tony Belacastro, known as the Magician, died ten years ago, but the secrets to his magic are written in his "Trick Recipes."

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: The widow Elena is the only one who knows where her late husband hid his fortune. Zenigata shows up to protect her from Lupin's gang, who are out to steal it from her. Zenigata and Elena go to her mountain retreat to hide from Lupin.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Nyx, Agent MI6 of the British Secret Service, values his wife and daughters above all others, so he keeps his identity as MI6 a secret from them. However, one of his daughters is kidnapped by some mysterious men.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: An eerie old castle converted to a hotel, known as the "The Mansion of the Cursed Bride," where the ghost of a bride is said to appear. It's said that a priceless treasure rests in the hotel, so Lupin and the gang pay a visit.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Long ago a dictator was assassinated, and the assassins involved were later killed one by one. Goemon was one of those involved in the assassination. A former bodyguard of the assassinated dictator, the legendary sniper Zora, might be out for revenge...

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Lupin is invited by both Fujiko and Rebecca to a couples-only wine auction party. Both women have their sights on the same thing: The Lovesick Pig, a legendary wine appearing in the auction.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Rebecca is kidnapped and Lupin must rescue her! Before she was kidnapped, Rebecca had been deciphering a book left behind by a genius scientist, and MI6 made the mysterious comment that it was the "Dream of Italy."

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Lupin finally deciphers the book left behind by the genius scientist Uraga, and then mysteriously falls asleep. He ends up in a world where it's impossible to tell whether what he sees is a dream or reality. Is this the "Dream of Italy"?!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Lupin has been arrested and imprisoned. He's tried everything he could to escape, but Zenigata stops him every time. Zenigata then sends Lupin to an even higher-security prison, just to be on the safe side. Has the end of Lupin III has come at last?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Lupin is so broke that he doesn't know what he'll eat tomorrow, so he concocts a plan to steal the Mona Lisa. But the Mona Lisa won't be easy to steal. He does his best to weave through the security net Zenigata has set.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Like a she-devil, the diamond "Cleopatra's Soul" is constantly changing owners. In search of the diamond, Lupin arrives at what appears to be an ordinary school...

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Lupin, Jigen, and Goemon decide to go eat some tasty sushi, but when they hop in the car to leave, they find a dog inside. Lupin promises to drop the dog off with Fujiko while they're out getting sushi.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Greco is a man revered as a savior for defeating evildoers one after another. Everyone Greco targets die within 24 hours, killing and being killed by their own comrades. When provoked by Greco, Lupin and the gang head to Greco's church.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: A mysterious portrait of Lupin appears at a major fashion show in Milan. When it's determined that the portraits have been painted by Leonardo Da Vinci, Lupin realizes something and rushes to the church where "The Last Supper" is displayed.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: While shopping with his family, Nyx is shot by someone and loses consciousness. He wakes up bound, and before he is Percival, his boss from his days as MI6.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Lupin has stolen the car that the famous singer Nora Anita loved and drove for nearly half a century. Zenigata and the police are after him, but they won't make a move for fear of damaging the priceless car. Where is Lupin headed in the treasured car?!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: While in Italy, Lupin gets a call from someone claiming to have kidnapped Fujiko. The kidnapper blackmails Lupin into stealing a marionette once owned by Gennai Hiraga and now being kept in a mansion in Tokyo.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Declarations of theft show up throughout the city, and they all bear the message "Tonight I'm going to get you, Lupin III," with a lipstick mark underneath. The one who's been distributing the notes is Rebecca.
programme.sub-title: I'm Going to Get You, Lupin

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Da Vinci announces that he is going to unveil his latest work in San Marino. Its title is "World Harmony." After the announcement, for some reason, people all around the Italian Peninsula fall unconscious... and Lupin and the gang are no exception.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Rebecca's personality is under Da Vinci's control. In an effort to save her, Lupin delves into her mind, where he struggles with all kinds of traps set by Da Vinci. He manages to find Rebecca's memories, but Da Vinci has overwritten all her memories.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Lupin meets Rebecca to sign divorce papers, before they could finish they are attacked by zombies.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Rebecca remembers the first time she meets Lupin.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd TVSP #13: Alcatraz Connection
programme.desc: Master thief Lupin III, gunslinger Jigen and swordmaster Goemon are back for a new caper, this time aboard the casino-ship Machine Gun Kelly. Between the mafia, interpol, and a secret organization based under Alcatraz!

programme.title: Snowpiercer, (2014, Action)
programme.desc: After a failed global-warming experiment, a post-apocalyptic Ice Age has killed off nearly all life on the planet.

programme.title: Universal Soldier, (1992, Action)
programme.desc: A woman reporter discovers a Defense Department project to create androids from the bodies of Vietnam soldiers, to be then used as an elite anti-terrorism unit.

programme.title: The Running Man, (1987, Action)
programme.desc: A wrongly-convicted man must try to survive a public execution gauntlet staged as a TV game show.

programme.title: Overlord, (2018, Military & War Action)
programme.desc: Nothing can prepare you for the mind-blowing mayhem that is Overlord. Mega producer J.J. Abrams creates an insanely twisted thrill ride about a team of American troops who come face-to-face with Nazi super-soldiers unlike the world has ever seen.

programme.title: Hansel and Gretel: Witch Hunters, (2013, Action)
programme.desc: Get ready for a twisted take on the classic tale as Hansel and Gretel have turned pro, coping with the trauma of their childhood captivity by slaying witches for hire.

programme.title: The Running Man, (1987, Action)
programme.desc: A wrongly-convicted man must try to survive a public execution gauntlet staged as a TV game show.

programme.title: Universal Soldier, (1992, Action)
programme.desc: A woman reporter discovers a Defense Department project to create androids from the bodies of Vietnam soldiers, to be then used as an elite anti-terrorism unit.

programme.title: Overlord, (2018, Military & War Action)
programme.desc: Nothing can prepare you for the mind-blowing mayhem that is Overlord. Mega producer J.J. Abrams creates an insanely twisted thrill ride about a team of American troops who come face-to-face with Nazi super-soldiers unlike the world has ever seen.

programme.title: Hansel and Gretel: Witch Hunters, (2013, Action)
programme.desc: Get ready for a twisted take on the classic tale as Hansel and Gretel have turned pro, coping with the trauma of their childhood captivity by slaying witches for hire.

programme.title: Billy Two Hats, (1974, Drama)
programme.desc: Archie (Gregory Peck) and his partner, Billy (Desi Arnaz, Jr.) are bandits by trade, staging daring robberies throughout the American frontier. But when their latest heist takes a deadly turn, they are pursued by a ruthless marshal (Jack Warden).

programme.title: Five Guns To Tombstone, (1960, Drama)
programme.desc: A reformed outlaw is living a clean life until his no-good brother who just escaped from prison ropes him into pulling a robbery. Now Billy has his own plan...to prevent it. And all he needs is his six shooters and a little luck.

programme.title: The Gunfighter, (1950, Drama)
programme.desc: A retired gunslinger is forced to strap on his six-shooters once again by the vengeful brothers of a man he killed in self-defense.

programme.title: Lonesome Dove, (1989, Drama)
programme.desc: Texas Rangers and long-time ranching partners Gus McCrae and Woodrow Call meet their old friend Jake, and decide to strike out from their south Texas base and drive a cattle herd to Montana.

programme.title: Lonesome Dove, (1989, Drama)
programme.desc: McCrae and Wood's cattle drive faces deadly situations. Sheriff July Johnson heads to Texas, and former prostitute Lorena is abandoned by Jake and kidnapped by the psychotic Blue Duck.
programme.sub-title: Lonesome Dove: Part II - On The Trail

programme.title: Lonesome Dove, (1989, Drama)
programme.desc: Gus and July save Lorena from Blue Duck, but at a deadly cost. Jake runs with a bad crowd and pays the price. July accepts that his wife has left him and stays on at Clara's with his newborn son.
programme.sub-title: Lonesome Dove: Part III - The Plains

programme.title: Lonesome Dove, (1989, Drama)
programme.desc: The cattle drive reaches Nebraska, where Gus and Clara reunite. Drought and Indian attacks take their toll as the drive reaches Montana, and Gus is wounded. Call honors his best friend's request.

programme.title: Johnny Guitar, (1954, Drama)
programme.desc: Gambling house operator Vienna seeks control of a town as archrival Emma Small sets out to force Vienna out of town. The timely arrival of Johnny Guitar thwarts Emma's dark plans, but doesn't prevent a showdown between the women.

programme.title: Shane, (1953, Drama)
programme.desc: A retired gunfighter, now a drifter determined to establish a peaceful life, comes to the aid of a homestead family threatened by a land baron and his hired gun.

programme.title: The Tin Star, (1957, Drama)
programme.desc: Ben Owens, a greenhorn sheriff who hasn’t worn his badge long... and won’t live to wear it much longer unless he gets some savvy help.

programme.title: Skinwalkers, (2007, Action)
programme.desc: A 12-year-old boy and his mother become the targets of two warring werewolf packs, each with different intentions and motives.

programme.title: The Poughkeepsie Tapes, (2009, Slashers and Serial Killers)
programme.desc: When hundreds of videotapes showing torture, murder, and dismemberment are found in an abandoned house, they reveal a serial killer's decade-long reign of terror and become the most disturbing collection of evidence homicide detectives have ever seen.

programme.title: Paranormal Activity, (2009, Horror)
programme.desc: After a young, middle-class couple moves into what seems like a typical suburban house, they become increasingly disturbed by a presence that may or may not be demonic and active at night.

programme.title: Paranormal Activity 2, (2010, Horror)
programme.desc: As a couple welcome a newborn baby into their home, a demonic presence begins terrorizing them, tearing apart their perfect world and turning it into an inescapable nightmare.

programme.title: Paranormal Activity 3, (2011, Horror)
programme.desc: Paranormal Activity 3 takes you back to where it all began, and the activity is more intense than ever. The cameras are on and recording the chilling moments when evil begins to terrorize young sisters Katie and Kristi for the first time.

programme.title: Paranormal Activity 4, (2012, Horror)
programme.desc: Katie disappeared with her nephew Hunter with no survivors. Five years later she's returned with a mysterious boy, ready to target new victims with her demonic rage in a quiet neighborhood.

programme.title: Paranormal Activity: The Marked Ones, (2014, Horror)
programme.desc: The activity is back and has claimed a new victim. Jesse has been hearing horrifying sounds from his neighbor’s apartment, but when he sets out to uncover their source, he encounters an ancient evil that won’t rest until it’s claimed his soul.

programme.title: Paranormal Activity: The Ghost Dimension, (2014, Horror)
programme.desc: For the first time you will SEE the activity... When a new family moves into a familiar house, they discover a mysterious video camera that reveals the presence of a demonic threat and soon find themselves terrorized by an ancient evil.

programme.title: Paranormal Activity, (2009, Horror)
programme.desc: After a young, middle-class couple moves into what seems like a typical suburban house, they become increasingly disturbed by a presence that may or may not be demonic and active at night.

programme.title: The Governor chases a fleeing dissenter; while the Governor is gone, a traitor tries to sabotage his plans.

programme.title: The group learns that a truce with the Governor must come with a huge sacrifice on their part; Rick decides Michonne's fate.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: As the Governor's impending attack looms, Rick and the others consider whether the prison is worth defending; Andrea struggles to escape captivity.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: The group lives a more peaceful life at the prison and strives to hold onto humanity; problems arise when Rick encounters a new survivor.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: Facing a new enemy, Rick abandons his quiet lifestyle so that he and the others can fight to protect their hard-won livelihood.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: A group leaves the prison to search for supplies; the remaining members of the group deal with recent losses.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: Daryl and a small group set out on foot in search of medicine, but their mission faces obstacles; Rick and Carol find two uninfected stragglers in a nearby town.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: Assorted enemies pressure Rick and the group; the survivors and the prison may reach a breaking point.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: Following his defeat at Woodbury, the Governor wanders aimlessly until he encounters a family in need.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: At the camp outside the prison, the addition of new members threatens the peace; something new unfolds as the Governor plans his next move.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: Things finally begin to calm at the prison until Rick and the group face imminent danger when the Governor arrives with his forces.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: Rick and Carl look for shelter while Rick deals with old wounds; those left at the prison consider whether survival alone will be enough.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead
